alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Malibu Coast; San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Valley; Ventura County Inland Coast; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 18 at 1:54AM PDT until October 18 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility will create dangerous driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roadways affected will include portions of Highways 1 and 101, and other roads across the coast.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
